text: Pippo Santonastaso (born 25 May 1936) is an Italian actor and comedian. He was born in Castel San Giovanni, Piacenza. Santonastaso created an original comic duo with his younger brother Mario and were in many RAI variety shows. He appeared in many commedia sexy all'italiana movies such as Geometra Prinetti selvaggiamente Osvaldo. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian comedians
title: Pippo Santonastaso
